response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,500,000 to you, and I believe it would greatly enhance your endeavors or personal collection. Considering its unparalleled quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending a special offer to you.

For a limited time only, you have the chance to secure this masterpiece at an extraordinary price of $1,350,000. This represents a remarkable saving of $150,000 compared to its market value, making it an irresistible deal.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am here to assist you through every step of the process and ensure a smooth transaction. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
